**Performance Release** - Batch encoding & benchmarks

## Highlights

## What's New

### New API
```rust
// Parallel encoding of multiple texts
tokenizer.encode_batch(texts, add_special_tokens) -> Result<Vec<Vec<TokenId>>>
```

### Performance Improvements
| Operation | Improvement |
|-----------|-------------|
| `encode()` | 1.5-2x faster |
| `encode_batch()` | 2-4x faster |
| `decode()` | ~40% faster |
| `from_gguf_file()` | ~40% faster |

### Thread Safety
- `Tokenizer` is now `Send + Sync`
- Safe for concurrent use across threads

### Benchmarks
```bash
cargo bench --bench tokenization
```

## Installation

```toml
[dependencies]
shimmytok = "0.2"
```
